name: MetaPets
description: Metapets aims to be a first step in bringing love and companionship to the metaverse in a personalized way, allowing users to become owners of pets of their design. Never again do you have to worry about the painful feelings that come with loss. Allergic to cats but love them? Fulfill your heartâ€™s wish to own your cat, made into an NFT, where the colors, sizes, and loveable furriness are customizable into your forever friend.
